value.0: A long time ago there was an ivory tower in the Emerald Hills which housed a wizard's academy. The school thrived for many generations until the headmaster passed away. Soon after, the lesser instructors of the school began squabbling over control of the academy. As the bickering and scheming of the instructors became more belligerent, the size of the faculty decreased until only two instructors remained. In the final battle for control of the school, the two instructors destroyed one another, taking the upper levels of the academy with them. Only the subterranean level, where the creatures used for making the academy's famed magical items were held, survived unscathed.
